items.title: GOP congressman says Capitol Police is investigating swastika in his office
items.description: Rep. Dave Taylor’s office called the appearance of an American flag with a swastika on it “vile vandalism.” An image of the flag taken from a virtual ...

items.title: Supreme Court seems open to limiting key section of Voting Rights Act
items.description: Further limits on the use of race in drawing electoral districts could have a major impact on representation in Congress and legislatures.

items.title: U.S. pushes Russia to negotiate as Hegseth warns Moscow of ‘costs’
items.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky is pushing for Tomahawk missiles as the Trump administration tries to prod Russia into talks on ending the war.

items.title: Judge orders Trump administration to pause shutdown layoffs
items.description: Unions have sued to block dismissals during the government shutdown.
